header.name: Parijat Khan
header.title: Solution Designer
header.summary: Solutions Architect, Technical Lead and Polyglot engineer with over 10 years of experience designing and delivering scalable enterprise solutions. Proven expertise in bridging the gap between complex architectural concepts and hands-on full-stack development. A strategic thinker dedicated to driving technical excellence, mentoring cross-functional teams, and leveraging emerging technologies to solve business-critical challenges.

careerHighlights.title: Full-Stack Expertise
careerHighlights.description: Deep expertise in Java, .NET, and Python ecosystems. Capable of architecting complex backends and building intuitive frontends.

careerHighlights.title: AI & Agentic Systems
careerHighlights.description: Skilled in developing autonomous agents using Pydantic, Semantic Kernel, and modern LLM orchestration patterns.

careerHighlights.title: Certified Professional
careerHighlights.description: Certified across enterprise cloud architecture, Scalable Java Microservices, and advanced deep learning practices.

Absorbed new Honeywell Voice solutions quickly and trained the team, trimming adoption time by 60%
Designed a Python-Django release management service with a React.js UI to streamline deployments

Contributed to solution architecture for six customer-specific customizations
Independently delivered five pilots that secured the follow-on engagements
Standardized the custom build pipeline, shrinking human errors by 52% and build times by 43%

roles.title: Senior Engineer

recommendations.text: Parijat is an asset to any team, plenty of ideas, drive and ambition. Over the years I have worked with Parijat I have been inspired and had pleasure working with him on some of our large projects. I expect him to make a positive impact wherever he is.
recommendations.author: Simon Riley

recommendations.text: Parijat is, in short, a Swiss Army Knife of IT. He has been an invaluable member of our team delivering high quality creative solutions to complex problems. He has an amazing ability to quickly learn any new technology, hit the ground running and take things further where he can mentor and guide others. Parijat's outstanding delivery focus has helped us tremendously with our recent complex programs requiring integration of voice technology and machine learning with business processes.
recommendations.author: Antra Sinha

recommendations.text: He had gained so much expertise on the subject matter that he was highly respected and a go-to person for India as well as global stakeholders. He is a technically sound designer, developer who can be banked for 100% accountability. Worked collaborative with software engineering team to ensure that customer ideas are prioritized and added to the base offering. Given an opportunity I would not hesitate to work with Parijat again in future.
recommendations.author: Abdul Gaffar
recommendations.role: Director of Software Engineering, Wind River

recommendations.text: I am lucky to have worked with Parijat, a great team player in our team in the role of Solution Designer and Programmer for Voice. I have seen Parijat go above and beyond in designing and customizing Voice software solutions and collaboration with diverse customers in EMEA and META regions during the 4 years that we work together. I am amazed how Parijat taught himself Firebird to accommodate projects for customers. Above all, Parijat is a fine person to work with and Parijat`s talent made him a valuable member of our team.
recommendations.author: Michael Choi
recommendations.role: Sr. Project Manager - Global Professional Services, Honeywell
